tag_list: online-aukcije, prodaja, kupovina, besplatno, internet-zarada, polovni-delovi, online-prodaja, internet-prodavnica
overview:
www.KUPISSIMO.com a web site dedicated to auctions, which started operating in 31.12.2011.

Through this site you can totally free to sell or buy, even with the use kupissimo API to your site, you can open the online store.

On this site for free, you can:

  • Set up the auction,
  • Sale of fixed price
  • Combination (auction but it has a fixed price)
  • Upload video clip / this
  • Upload a maximum of 15 images
  • Free to bid or buy the product at a price fikcnoj
  • A multitude of other options

Then by kupissimo API (http://kupissimo.com/kupissimo-api-info.html) you can put on your web site a list of products that you sell (your own or others’) and allow yourself time collecting kupissimo loan that you can use to set of pronounced auction.

Done from scratch in modern technologies (J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Tomcat, MySQL), and constantly adding new features, aims to be one of the major sites in Serbia and in the neighborhood.
